title: MAZE
sinopse:
Anyone can fall into the maze of illusions and realities.
What is real and what is just a dream? What if you could find out what role do you take in other people´s minds? What if you wished to be young again? What if you´re lying your way through life? What if you suffered from chronic indecision or really bad luck?
Six horror stories that will make you think about yourselves and the world.
